dependencies.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.
dependencies.name: arrow

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.
dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam

dependent_to.description: This is the python client for Arkouda.
dependent_to.name: py-arkouda

dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
dependent_to.name: py-astropy

dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this package is to coordinate dependencies within AzureML
packages. It is not intended for public use.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataset-runtime

dependent_to.description:
Built based on the Apache Arrow columnar memory format, cuDF is a GPU
DataFrame library for loading, joining, aggregating, filtering, and
otherwise manipulating data.
dependent_to.name: py-cudf

dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.
dependent_to.name: py-datasets

dependent_to.description:
Embedding reader is a module to make it easy to read efficiently a large
collection of embeddings stored in any file system.
dependent_to.name: py-embedding-reader

dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.
dependent_to.name: py-horovod

dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.
dependent_to.name: py-mlflow

dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.
dependent_to.name: py-modin

dependent_to.description: Plotting scripts for long read sequencing data
dependent_to.name: py-nanoplot

dependent_to.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependent_to.name: py-pandas

dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.
dependent_to.name: py-petastorm

dependent_to.description: Pandas extension arrays for spatial/geometric operations.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialpandas

dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-streamlit

dependent_to.description:
Xarray extension for unstructured climate and global weather data
analysis and visualization
dependent_to.name: py-uxarray

description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.
name: py-pyarrow
